opening.message: Hey there, I've been admiring your profile. What drew you to this app?

options.text: I appreciate genuine connections that start with good conversation
The chance to meet someone who knows what they want
Let's skip the small talk - you're hot
Just browsing, not sure what I'm looking for

build_connection.message: I like that answer. What's your idea of a perfect first date?

options.text: Drinks with deep conversation to see if we click
Something active where we can break the touch barrier naturally
Netflix and chill at your place
I prefer to chat more before meeting

physical_connection.message: I like a man who's comfortable with touch. How do you feel about public displays of affection?

options.text: Light touches are fine if we're vibing - with consent
I'd wait until we're somewhere private
I'd grab your ass right now if I could
Not my style - I'm more reserved

consent_respect.message: Consent is sexy. What's your approach to checking in with a partner?

options.text: Verbal check-ins at each new level of intimacy
Reading body language and responding accordingly
I assume enthusiasm unless told otherwise
This feels like an interview...

green_flag.message: That's exactly what I wanted to hear. When can I take you out properly?

options.text: How about Friday? I know a great cocktail bar
Let's video chat first to build more anticipation
Only if you promise to kiss me goodnight
I need to check my schedule and get back to you

date_planned.message: Perfect. I'll pick you up at 8. Looking forward to continuing this in person...
